Description.Text:
Position The Metropole hotel is located in the central area Marina Centro of Rimini, just a few steps from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment took place in 2005.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. Dinner with 2 menus on choice, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
PRICES IN HBB AND FBB included: 1/2 l. mineral water + 1/4 l. wine per meal per person.
ALL INCLUSIVE HB/FB: includes drinks at meals (1/2 l.mineral water + 1/4 l.wine per meal per person) + beach service (1 sun umbrella per room and 1 sun bed per adult person).
SPORT & FACILITIES: Swimming pool open from 08/06/13 – 07/09/13 (09:00 – 12:00 and 14:30 – 18:00).
ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check in: from 12.00 (midday) - Check out: within 10.00 am.
